title: Notwithstanding the above, in partially built-up plots where the area still to be built upon does not exceed 5,000 sq
clause_text: Notwithstanding the above, in partially built-up plots where the area still to be built upon does not exceed 5,000 sq. m an access of 3.6m width may be considered adequate. If such an access is through a built over arch, this access shall have a height of not less than 4.5m.
section: Access in Partially Built up Plots:
